review: Shishuka is one stop shop for all your kid's health concerns. One need not run around to multiple doctors to get your kid treated. From my experience, I have felt all the staff to be very approachable. The play area is a great idea, atleast kids will be looking forward to visit the hospital. Very neatly maintained hospital. Panel of Doctors at Shishuka are well experienced especially Dr Bharath. He is very approachable, gives a patient ear to listen to all your problems and explains why the medicine is given. My son had ear infection when he was just 3 months old, and after showing him to 2 other doctors for almost a month, it was Dr Bharat's medication that helped him recover. Same with my sister's kid. I hope Dr is able to achieve his vision of "Heal Happy". All the best to Dr and the entire Shishuka team! Any time I would recommend to visit this hospital.

Doctor Bharath is a very patient listener, he explains to every health query I have regarding my child's health. My daughter, Manha has wheezing issues and used to have attacks very frequently earlier before we started treatment under Dr. Bharath...After consultation with him, we observed marked development in her condition. The best thing about the doctor is that in some emergency situations, when I could not visit him in his clinic, I msged him and he replied with prescription.....he takes his time to understand not only patient's condition but a mother's situation too...

When Raghav was sick our Pead Dr Charles referred us to Dr Bharath. He said he is a brilliant Dr.
 
We got my son admitted and was taken care of very well. Within 1 days most of his symptoms gone and he recovered within 2 days. Dr Bharath was very nice and friendly and visited us as much as possible. Explained all the details to us. The staff both nursing as well as admin are very good.
 
From the bottom of my heart we sincerely thanks Dr Bharath for all his help.
 
May the light of Jupiter shine on him always.

My baby suffers from severe heart disease because of his bad lungs. We were referred here from Jayadeva Hospital to meet a pulmonologist as they felt the heart issue could be because of the lungs. Since we started treatment here, his lungs are doing better and surprisingly his heart problem also is reducing. We are so happy our heart doctors referred my child to a pediatric pulmonologist in time. Now both his heart and lungs are doing well and we are happy.

As parents we sometimes don't know where to go and which specialist to meet for some of these problems. Luckily at Shishuka we have all the specialists we needed. We are thankful also to our doctor who referred us on time here. I hope my child's lungs completely heal with time as Dr Bharath Says.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. Hope your baby recovers fast
replier_name: Dr. K R Bharath Kumar Reddy

review:
Had been to Shishuka a couple of times. My niece loves the place. She in fact becomes excited to visit Shishuka. 

The recent children's day celebrations was pure fun for all kids out there. Kids heal faster in such an environment.

The hospital and Dr Bharath are so child friendly that it's never been this easy to get her to visit a doctor. One of the finest children's hospital in Bangalore. 

Nurses are very caring. All services under one roof. Play area and wards are brilliant. 

Would highly recommend Shishuka Children's Speciality Hospital to all.

Shishuka Children's Speciality hospital is a new hospital that has come up in HrBr layout. Have been there a couple of times with my little one for regular check ups as well as vaccinations. *** ******* ***** ***** ** ** ********* ***** ********** *** *** *** ** **** ******* ***** **** ***** **** *** ******* ***** **** **** The first vaccination that my baby received from him was a cake walk. It's very important for the baby to be comfortable with the doctor so that they are not scared of hospitals and medicines and Dr. Bharath is a pro at it. Also, unlike other hospitals, getting an appointment here is way easier. 

The only one thing that the hospital lacks currently is that it is a little unorganized. I guess that's because it has newly begun it's operations and the staff is still learning to manage the hospital. I am sure that will improve with time. As long as my kid is taken care of well, nothing else matters!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had been to Shishuka  hospital  for my 3year old son who had fever. Met Dr Bharath. Fever for my kid was very high. Doctor gave medicines, but i am not sure why the fever got increased ever more high. Came to hospital agian evening, they refused to consult Dr Bharat. Finally i had to go to another hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I liked the approach Dr. Bharath Kumar Reddy took to treat my daughter (2yr old). Couple of doctor had suggested bronoscopy where Dr. Bharath approached it in a systematic way to detect the issue. Finally it turned out that my daughter was allergic rather than anything else. Her health has definitely improved in last 3 months. Thanks to doctor

The very thought of gong to a Hospital is scary and traumatizing. But caring doctors like you make it friendly and pleasing. 

More than a good doctor, I value the fact that you were a good listener. More than being just professionals, At Shishuka I found the help desk and nursing staff’s attitude as exceptional and they were very polite.Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you Susmitha.
replier_name: Dr. K R Bharath Kumar Reddy

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My Kid was suffering from recurring cough and cold every 15 days from Oct 2016. We had been to many doctors seeking suggestions, but there medication seemed temporary relief.

Then one of the doctors suggested to see Pulmonologist  Dr. K R Bharath Kumar Reddy, who is specialized in this field.

We went through a 15 days of treatment, and my  kid is improved a lot.
Her health has become really better.

Thanks to the Doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Bharat Kumar Reddy listened to the problem carefully before recommending the treatment. He explained all the facts with good explanation and I felt he either did not scare us for all the jargon or hide the facts to make us feel comfortable for the sake of it. Rather he showed us the treatment options, the timeline for the treatment and the care to be taken during and after the treatment.

We strongly recommend Dr Bharat Kumar Reddy.

We have consulted Dr Bharath Reddy for my son, and he listen us patiencely and advice to admit 
He explained the process well and not advices unnecessary test that's the best part .
He are happy with the service and treatment 
Hospital staff also very friendly and we're all the time present to assist us.

My son is being treated by Dr Bharath for a long time for cough and breathing difficulties. He is much better and  his wheezing has reduced.  We have searched many doctors and finally found him. No one could treat my son properly. We are finally happy. Thank you doctor Bharath

review:
In today's Era.. Shishuka is one of the most spectacular Hospital for kids treatment,  You will find topnotch doctors with very warm heart. Where we can see right from Hygiene to the treatment is excellent.. each doctor's treatment to the kids is mindblowing.. all we can say is, we can trust the Doctors here where we just say our concerns about the health of our kids and they will take care of the rest.. and the way they give hope to the parents is just mindblowing.
 Hatsoff to the Doctor's and special thanks to Dr. Bharat Kumar Reddy and entire staff for the treatment from the bottom of our heart.. We pray Allah azoujal give Shifa/cure in their hands for every soul they touch.. Ameen..👍👍

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Bharath has been very gentle and friendly with the kid. He patiently answers any queries we have. We appreciate the treatment he provides. We have the pwhealth app provided for follow up calls. Unfortunately when I set up an appointment it let me talk to the doc but since he was seeing other patients he couldn't help. My consultation got missed as the app considers a call as 1 consultation.  It would have been good, if we could reach the doctor for follow ups as not everytime we can visit the hospital.
reply_text: Sorry to hear that you couldn't get through. We are facing a problem with Pw as they are not co-ordinating time in between patients. Unfortunately now the Karnataka Medical Council has issued a notice that we should not prescribe anything to patients via the phone, which will be a hurdle to online consultations. However, until then, would request you to contact the hospital via the mfine app or call the reception and leave a message so that we can call back. Currently we don't even have account of who missed the call via Pw.
replier_name: Dr. K R Bharath Kumar Reddy

review: the doctor prescribed more test to be done on 3 weeks old baby. we were done getting her pricked for billurubin tests and plenty other tests. there was no proper explanation given to our answers. all tests report would come normal... we had already got plenty of test done and showed him al the reports but he wanted to get more test done meet some specialist. we decided to not go with his advice and look for second advice before getting our daughter pricked. and we found another doctor who was able to answer our questions and explain why the reason for prolonged hai dice finally after 7 weeks my daughter was free from jaundice. a without getting her pricked again and again.

Excellent experience for my baby girl.. Very pleasant voice..detailed explanation to the treatment.. Prefers less medicines.. Which is why I feel comfortable.. Reasonable fees.. Hospital is also well managed and appointment starts on time.. Highly recommended for new born..

We consulted Dr Reddy regarding our 1 yr old disruptive sleep. With his guidance we were able to get her to sleep thru the night. However our experience with the staff, lab staff in particular were not good. **** **** *** ********** **** **** *** **** ************ *** we were made to wait for hrs to get few tests done since the technicians were not in the hospital , this was during a weekday and during working hrs. That was a very frustrating and a stressful experience.

** ******* ** ********** He spent enough time and proactively asked the questions to diagnose the problem. He seems to be very experienced and looking for the optimal solution so that the problem will not occur in the future. He clarified all our doubts and corrected the mistakes which we are doing while administering the medicines.Overall , I am very satisfied with the approach and interaction with Dr.Bharath.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: * ***** *** ****** ********* ************* *** he is Very much approachable. *** ********* ** ****** *****But the emergency staff were really annoying. I had been to the emergency room at around 9.30 PM today for nebuluzing my 2 year old. A male nurse initially attended us with out any interest. He mixed two medicines together and started oxygen. I have been seeing nebulization for years now since I am an asthma patient myself and never have I ever seen anyone mixing medicine from 2 respules. Kid was uncontrollable after he started nebulization. I had given nebulization in morning from the same emergency but differed set of people and my kid did not create any fuss. this particular male nurse just turned on the machine and left. we pay 300 rs nebulization charge expecting some help from the person. But he never bothered to check anything. today's episode has made my kid scared about your hospital and nebulization.
Dr. Bharath is very patient and approaches in a very social way to his patients. Suggested tests to be done.
